text: Germano Caraffini (born 4 May 1936) is an Italian wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle middleweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Italy Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Genoa
title: Germano Caraffini
